thread.title: Durant shakes off boos as Warriors rip Thunder
thread.title_full: Durant shakes off boos as Warriors rip Thunder

author: USA TODAY Sports
title: Durant shakes off boos as Warriors rip Thunder
text:
Durant shakes off boos as Warriors rip Thunder Durant and Westbrook both have big games Post to Facebook Durant shakes off boos as Warriors rip Thunder Durant and Westbrook both have big games  //usat.ly/2ky5Est   Durant shakes off boos as Warriors rip Thunder Sam Amick , USA TODAY Sports 11:14   Former teammates Oklahoma City Thunder guard Russell Westbrook (0) and Golden State Warriors forward Kevin Durant (35) went at it in OKC on Saturday. (Photo: Mark D. Smith-USA TODAY Sports)   
OKLAHOMA CITY -- Kevin Durant got a rude welcome in his return to face his old team, but in the end, he got the last laugh. 
Durant had 34 points and nine rebounds and the Golden State Warriors defeated the Thunder 130-114 at Chesapeake Energy Arena. 
Durant's former teammate Russell Westbrook came close to his 27th triple-double with 47 points, 11 rebounds and eight assists.
